raw_text: ADIKARIWATTAGE – Dr. LLOYD – Loving husband of Badra Lecamwasam (Retd. Teacher,​ M.M.V. Matugama),​ father of Thishan (Melbourne),​ Gayan (Royal Hospital,​ Wellawatte) and Varuna (University of Moratuwa),​ father-in-law of Nadeesha (nee Ileperuma,​ Melbourne),​ Himali (nee Senanayake),​ Attorney General’s Department and Nadeeshani (nee Walpita) Family Health Bureau. Cortege leaves residence 104A,​ Heenatiyangala Road,​ Nagoda,​ Kalutara for Cremation at Etawila Cemetery (Nagoda,​ Kalutara) on 12th July (Wednesday) at 4.00 p.m.042479

PIERIS – In loving memorial of MICHAEL (SLBC/​ITN). Dearly beloved husband of late Joyce,​ loving father of mark (Sri Lanka),​ Bernadette & Assunthi (from Australia),​ father-in-law of Jenniffer (Bahrain),​ Russel Ekanayake (Australia),​ Christopher Bocks (Australia),​ adored grandfather of Myran & Sabrina,​ Natalie & Chris,​ Dimitri & Janelle,​ Chain & Seles,​ Yannitk & Milano (Australia),​ great grandfather of Jaylon,​ Cruz,​ Jai & Mila,​ expired. Funeral Mass will be on Thursday 13th July 2023 at 2.00 p.m. at St. Mary’s Church,​ Dandenong,​ Melbourne & afterwards Cremation at Springvale Cemetery,​ Melbourne.042536

RATWATTE – AJIT,​ “Safe in the Arms of Jesus”. Dearly beloved husband of Nelun,​ loving father of Ishanth and Chayani,​ father-in-law of Chethika and Afsar,​ everloving grandfather of Soraya,​ passedaway peacefully on 10th July 2023. Cortege leaves residence at No. 16/​1,​ Park Road,​ Colombo 5 on Wednesday 12th July at 4.30 p.m. for Cremation at 5.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella. (New Crematorium).042670
